full_summary:
**Title:** Credit Reporting Services
**Reference Number:** PW-23-01021298
**Publication Date:** January 13, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** March 7, 2023, 14:00 EST
**Category of Procurement:** Service
**Type of Requirement:** Request for Proposal

## Background
The Department of National Defence (DND) requires the provision of credit checks and reports to support the security screening process. The credits will be used to conduct both individual and bulk requests.

## Procurement Requirements
The successful bidder will provide a minimum of 288,000 credit reports over a two-year contract period, with three one-year option periods.

## Procurement Method
A Competitive - Open bidding process will be used. The DND has the intention to award a single contract for this requirement.

## Trade Agreements Applicable
This tender is subject to the following trade agreements: 
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)

## Tender Description
The department is seeking a contractor to provide credit reporting services. The selected vendor will be able to provide credit checks and reports for the department's security screening process.

## Reporting Period 
This contract is expected to begin in April 2023.

## Sourcing Methods
Only companies that meet the requirements can submit a bid. 

Each vendor must have all attachments to submit a bid successfully:

* RFP package with bid instructions
* Credit reporting template
* Confidentiality agreement

Please submit your bids on or before March 7, 2023 at 14:00 EST to be considered for this procurement.

Please follow the contact information below for any questions:
Ratnam, Ashley
ashley.ratnam@forces.gc.ca 

Canada’s other Government procurement source is [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca)

Contact Ashley Ratnam (Ashley.ratnam@forces.gc.ca) about any questions you have on this announcement. Note: written contact ONLY.
